item.title: Gadwal leaders rally support for BC Bandh
item.description:
<![CDATA[Leaders of the Backward Classes Joint Action Committee (BC JAC) and various political and social organisations in Gadwal have called upon the people to make Saturdayâ€™s state-wide Telangana BC Bandh a grand success. The bandh is being organised in support of the demand for the implementation of 42% reservation for BCs in the State.
The Telangana government had earlier announced 42% reservation for BCs; however, the High Court issued a stay order on the implementation of the reservation bill. In ...]]>
item.author: The Hans India

item.title: KTR to launch statewide tour as BRS plans major outreach
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Hyderabad: As the local body elections draw near, it appears that the BRS is stepping up its efforts for a strong campaign amid internal turmoil. Sources indicate that a strategic plan is currently in development. In this context, BRS working president KT Rama Rao is expected to begin field visits across the state soon. He is scheduled to tour the constituencies of Kothagudem and Bhadrachalam on Sept 10 and 11.Furthermore, party insiders have mentioned that a rally and large public meeting w...]]>
item.author: Tnn
